name.description: Specifies the name of the Snapshot resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Snapshot. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

create_option.description: Indicates how the snapshot is to be created. Possible values are `Copy` or `Import`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

source_uri.description: Specifies the URI to a Managed or Unmanaged Disk. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

source_resource_id.description: Specifies a reference to an existing snapshot, when `create_option` is `Copy`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

storage_account_id.description: Specifies the ID of an storage account. Used with `source_uri` to allow authorization during import of unmanaged blobs from a different subscription. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

disk_size_gb.description: The size of the Snapshotted Disk in GB.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
